item.title: Democratic senator says classified meeting with intel agency is canceled after Loomer's criticism
item.description: The top ranking Democrat on the Senate Intelligence Committee says a classified meeting planned with a key U.S. spy agency was called off after it was...

item.title: Chicago prepares for an influx of National Guard troops and immigration agents
item.description: Chicago residents are bracing for an influx of military patrols and immigration agents in the coming days

item.title: December trial set for Milwaukee judge accused of helping man to evade arrest in courtroom
item.description: A Wisconsin judge accused of helping a man evade arrest in her courtroom by U.S. immigration agents will stand trial in December

item.title: VP Vance to meet with families of schoolchildren after church shooting in Minneapolis
item.description: Vice President JD Vance plans to visit Minneapolis on Wednesday to meet with families affected by a recent church shooting

item.title: NYC transit leaders respond to video of minors operating subway train
item.description: New York City transit leaders are criticizing a TikTok video showing minors operating a train while the conductor stands by
